meanings.definition: Of or relating to four roads or paths.
meanings.sent1: The quadrivial intersection had roads leading in all directions.
meanings.sent2: The town was known for its quadrivial layout with roads crossing at right angles.
meanings.sent3: I got lost at the quadrivial junction and ended up circling back around.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a quadrivial maze, each thought leading down a different path.
meanings.sent5: The quadrivial crossroads was bustling with activity as travelers chose their routes.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the four branches of arithmetic, geometry, music, and astronomy.
meanings.sent1: The quadrivial subjects covered a wide range of knowledge.
meanings.sent2: She excelled in the quadrivial studies, mastering arithmetic, geometry, music, and astronomy.
meanings.sent3: The quadrivial lesson was so engaging that even the students who usually dozed off were wide awake.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a quadrivial library, each branch of knowledge neatly organized on its own shelf.
meanings.sent5: The quadrivial nature of the curriculum ensured a well-rounded education for the students.
